comments.content:
It looks like something from Alejandro Paul.

[www.evanmade.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20091012074040/http:/evanmade.com/)
I don’t see (evanmade.com) what you refer to. Perhaps it’s not a ’font?’

I think that’s just ’macursus”s web site.

Have you looked at House Industries? [House Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20091012074040/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/signpainterfontkit/viewfonts) is similar, but the ’s’ doesn’t match, for one thing. May be something from Sign DNA.

- Mike Yanega

You can see the SignDNA scripts [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20091012074040/http:/signdna.com/shop/index.php?main_page=index&cPath=1_8), but unfortunately, the samples are very small and incomplete. I have many full samples of them in Part 7 and 8 of my [Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20091012074040/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg1.html).

- Mike Yanega

Many thanks. I see similarities but no good footprint.  
LinK

Unless you also see this lettering for other things, you must consider that it could be custom lettering for a logo.

- Mike Yanega

Thank again Mike. I believe you’re correct that the lettering is a custom logo.  
LinK
